ui.panel.page-onboarding.intro: Bisch du parat, dis Deheim z erwecke, dini Privatsphäre zrugg z becho und ere weltwite Gmeindschaft vo Bastler biztrette?
ui.panel.page-onboarding.user.intro: Fönge mir ah mit em Erstelle vomene Benutzer.
ui.panel.page-onboarding.user.data.name: Name
ui.panel.page-onboarding.core-config.int: Hello {name}, welcome to Home Assistant. How would you like to name your home?
Wir wärde d Basisystellige zäme vornäh. Du chasch die Ystellige speter geng wider ändere.

Let's set up the location of your home so that you can display information such as the local weather and use sun-based or presence-based automations. This data is never shared outside of your network.
ui.panel.page-onboarding.core-config.tit: Söue mer dini lokale Ystellige ermittle?
ui.panel.page-onboarding.core-config.int: We can detect your location by making a one-time request to an external service.
Mir hei es paar Aagabe usgfüut. Bitte prüef, öb die guet sy u de chasch wyter fahre.

ui.panel.page-onboarding.integration.int: Devices and services are represented in Home Assistant as integrations. You can set them up now, or do it later from the configuration screen.
ui.panel.page-onboarding.analytics.prefe: Das beinhautet Informatione über dis System.

ui.panel.page-onboarding.analytics.need_: Du muesch die grundlegende Analyse aktiviere, das die Option verfüegbar wird
ui.panel.page-onboarding.analytics.intro: Teil die anonymisierte Informatione vo dire Installation mit üs und hiuf, das mer Home Assistant chöi besser mache und das mer Härsteller chöi überzüge, Dateschutz u lokali Kontrolle vo Date z verbessere.
